--- create_model_if_not_exists.sql
CREATE MODEL GeminiPro IF NOT EXISTS
INPUT (prompt STRING(MAX))
OUTPUT (content STRING(MAX))
REMOTE OPTIONS (
  endpoint = '//aiplatform.googleapis.com/projects/fake-project/locations/asia-northeast1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro',
  default_batch_size = 1
)
--- AST
&ast.CreateModel{
  Create:      0,
  Remote:      93,
  OrReplace:   false,
  IfNotExists: true,
  Name:        &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 22,
    Name:    "GeminiPro",
  },
  InputOutput: &ast.CreateModelInputOutput{
    Input:        37,
    Rparen:       91,
    InputColumns: []*ast.CreateModelColumn{
      &ast.CreateModelColumn{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 44,
          NameEnd: 50,
          Name:    "prompt",
        },
        DataType: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
          NamePos: 51,
          Rparen:  61,
          Name:    "STRING",
          Max:     true,
          Size:    nil,
        },
        Options: (*ast.Options)(nil),
      },
    },
    OutputColumns: []*ast.CreateModelColumn{
      &ast.CreateModelColumn{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 72,
          NameEnd: 79,
          Name:    "content",
        },
        DataType: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
          NamePos: 80,
          Rparen:  90,
          Name:    "STRING",
          Max:     true,
          Size:    nil,
        },
        Options: (*ast.Options)(nil),
      },
    },
  },
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 100,
    Rparen:  263,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 112,
          NameEnd: 120,
          Name:    "endpoint",
        },
        Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
          ValuePos: 123,
          ValueEnd: 236,
          Value:    "//aiplatform.googleapis.com/projects/fake-project/locations/asia-northeast1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro",
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 240,
          NameEnd: 258,
          Name:    "default_batch_size",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 261,
          ValueEnd: 262,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE MODEL IF NOT EXISTS GeminiPro INPUT (prompt STRING(MAX)) OUTPUT (content STRING(MAX)) REMOTE OPTIONS (endpoint = "//aiplatform.googleapis.com/projects/fake-project/locations/asia-northeast1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro", default_batch_size = 1)
